attributes.action: Open a UK Palestinian refugee scheme like we did for Ukrainian's
attributes.background: Citizens of the UK should have the ability to support palestian families affected by the war in Gaza, especially orphans.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a Palestinian Family Visa Scheme for Palestinian people affected by war: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648577

Create a 'Homes for Palestine' scheme so Palestinians can seek safety in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648734
